00073   union Sass_Value {
00074     struct Sass_Unknown unknown;
00075     struct Sass_Boolean boolean;
00076     struct Sass_Number  number;
00077     struct Sass_Color   color;
00078     struct Sass_String  string;

00092   enum Sass_Tag ADDCALL sass_value_get_tag(const union Sass_Value* v) { return v->unknown.tag; }

00155   // Creator functions for all value types

00157   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_boolean(bool val)
00158   {
00159     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00160     if (v == 0) return 0;
00161     v->boolean.tag = SASS_BOOLEAN;
00162     v->boolean.value = val;
00163     return v;
00164   }
00165 
00166   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_number(double val, const char* unit)
00167   {
00168     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00169     if (v == 0) return 0;
00170     v->number.tag = SASS_NUMBER;
00171     v->number.value = val;
00172     v->number.unit = unit ? sass_strdup(unit) : 0;
00173     if (v->number.unit == 0) { free(v); return 0; }
00174     return v;
00175   }
00176 
00177   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_color(double r, double g, double b, double a)
00178   {
00179     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00180     if (v == 0) return 0;
00181     v->color.tag = SASS_COLOR;
00182     v->color.r = r;
00183     v->color.g = g;
00184     v->color.b = b;
00185     v->color.a = a;
00186     return v;
00187   }
00188 
00189   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_string(const char* val)
00190   {
00191     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00192     if (v == 0) return 0;
00193     v->string.quoted = false;
00194     v->string.tag = SASS_STRING;
00195     v->string.value = val ? sass_strdup(val) : 0;
00196     if (v->string.value == 0) { free(v); return 0; }
00197     return v;
00198   }
00199 
00200   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_qstring(const char* val)
00201   {
00202     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00203     if (v == 0) return 0;
00204     v->string.quoted = true;
00205     v->string.tag = SASS_STRING;
00206     v->string.value = val ? sass_strdup(val) : 0;
00207     if (v->string.value == 0) { free(v); return 0; }
00208     return v;
00209   }
00210 
00211   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_list(size_t len, enum Sass_Separator sep)
00212   {
00213     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00214     if (v == 0) return 0;
00215     v->list.tag = SASS_LIST;
00216     v->list.length = len;
00217     v->list.separator = sep;
00218     v->list.values = (union Sass_Value**) calloc(len, sizeof(union Sass_Value));
00219     if (v->list.values == 0) { free(v); return 0; }
00220     return v;
00221   }
00222 
00223   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_map(size_t len)
00224   {
00225     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00226     if (v == 0) return 0;
00227     v->map.tag = SASS_MAP;
00228     v->map.length = len;
00229     v->map.pairs = (struct Sass_MapPair*) calloc(len, sizeof(struct Sass_MapPair));
00230     if (v->map.pairs == 0) { free(v); return 0; }
00231     return v;
00232   }
00233 
00234   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_null(void)
00235   {
00236     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00237     if (v == 0) return 0;
00238     v->null.tag = SASS_NULL;
00239     return v;
00240   }

00242   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_error(const char* msg)
00243   {
00244     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00245     if (v == 0) return 0;
00246     v->error.tag = SASS_ERROR;
00247     v->error.message = msg ? sass_strdup(msg) : 0;
00248     if (v->error.message == 0) { free(v); return 0; }
00249     return v;
00250   }
00251 
00252   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_make_warning(const char* msg)
00253   {
00254     Sass_Value* v = (Sass_Value*) calloc(1, sizeof(Sass_Value));
00255     if (v == 0) return 0;
00256     v->warning.tag = SASS_WARNING;
00257     v->warning.message = msg ? sass_strdup(msg) : 0;
00258     if (v->warning.message == 0) { free(v); return 0; }
00259     return v;
00260   }
00261 
00262   // will free all associated sass values
00263   void ADDCALL sass_delete_value(union Sass_Value* val) {
00264 
00265     size_t i;
00266     if (val == 0) return;
00267     switch(val->unknown.tag) {
00268         case SASS_NULL: {
00269         }   break;
00270         case SASS_BOOLEAN: {
00271         }   break;
00272         case SASS_NUMBER: {
00273                 free(val->number.unit);
00274         }   break;
00275         case SASS_COLOR: {
00276         }   break;
00277         case SASS_STRING: {
00278                 free(val->string.value);
00279         }   break;
00280         case SASS_LIST: {
00281                 for (i=0; i<val->list.length; i++) {
00282                     sass_delete_value(val->list.values[i]);
00283                 }
00284                 free(val->list.values);
00285         }   break;
00286         case SASS_MAP: {
00287                 for (i=0; i<val->map.length; i++) {
00288                     sass_delete_value(val->map.pairs[i].key);
00289                     sass_delete_value(val->map.pairs[i].value);
00290                 }
00291                 free(val->map.pairs);
00292         }   break;
00293         case SASS_ERROR: {
00294                 free(val->error.message);
00295         }   break;
00296         case SASS_WARNING: {
00297                 free(val->error.message);
00298         }   break;
00299     }
00300 
00301     free(val);
00302 
00303     }
00304 
00305   // Make a deep cloned copy of the given sass value
00306   union Sass_Value* ADDCALL sass_clone_value (const union Sass_Value* val)
00307   {
00308 
00309     size_t i;
00310     if (val == 0) return 0;
00311     switch(val->unknown.tag) {
00312         case SASS_NULL: {
00313                 return sass_make_null();
00314         }   break;
00315         case SASS_BOOLEAN: {
00316                 return sass_make_boolean(val->boolean.value);
00317         }   break;
00318         case SASS_NUMBER: {
00319                 return sass_make_number(val->number.value, val->number.unit);
00320         }   break;
00321         case SASS_COLOR: {
00322                 return sass_make_color(val->color.r, val->color.g, val->color.b, val->color.a);
00323         }   break;
00324         case SASS_STRING: {
00325                 return sass_make_string(val->string.value);
00326         }   break;
00327         case SASS_LIST: {
00328                 union Sass_Value* list = sass_make_list(val->list.length, val->list.separator);
00329                 for (i = 0; i < list->list.length; i++) {
00330                     list->list.values[i] = sass_clone_value(val->list.values[i]);
00331                 }
00332                 return list;
00333         }   break;
00334         case SASS_MAP: {
00335                 union Sass_Value* map = sass_make_map(val->map.length);
00336                 for (i = 0; i < val->map.length; i++) {
00337                     map->map.pairs[i].key = sass_clone_value(val->map.pairs[i].key);
00338                     map->map.pairs[i].value = sass_clone_value(val->map.pairs[i].value);
00339                 }
00340                 return map;
00341         }   break;
00342         case SASS_ERROR: {
00343                 return sass_make_error(val->error.message);
00344         }   break;
00345         case SASS_WARNING: {
00346                 return sass_make_warning(val->warning.message);
00347         }   break;
00348     }
00349 
00350     return 0;
00351 
00352   }
